div.p: On the left side viewer you can see your deployed applications. You can select a deployed application and, depending on its status, start, stop or undeploy it.

Additionally, you can see the monitoring statistics (multiple selection allowed for monitoring comparison) and the SLA contract for the selected applications. In the monitoring details view (center panel), set the monitoring statistics frame time. If not set, real-time monitoring statistics are shown. Click See Monitoring Statistics to start. On bottom tabbed panel you will see three panels, showing Selected Application details, a Response time graph and a Response code graph
